abstract: Aldermore Group, self-described challenger to Britain's top banks, prices its initial public offering at 1.92 pounds per share; pricing values company at 651 million pounds, or about $982 million.
lead_paragraph: The so-called challenger bank to Britain’s traditional financial powers sold about 35 percent of its capital in the offering of 117.9 million shares.

headline.main: Aldermore Is Valued at $982 Million in London I.P.O.

snippet: The so-called challenger bank to Britain’s traditional financial powers sold about 35 percent of its capital in the offering of 117.9 million shares.
